priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire CES Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C132518

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire CES Test Name Terminology

name: Combat Exposure Scale Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire CES Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Combat Exposure Scale Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - Did you ever go on combat patrols or have other dangerous duty?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - Ever Combat Patrols or Dangerous Duty

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - Were you ever surrounded by the enemy?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - Ever Surrounded by the Enemy

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often did you fire rounds at the enemy?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy
terms.submissionValue: CES01-How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy
synonyms: CES01-How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often were you in danger of being injured or killed (i.e., being pinned down, overrun, ambushed, near miss, etc.)?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - In Danger of Being Injured or Killed

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often did you see someone hit by incoming or outgoing rounds?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - See Someone Hit by Rounds

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - What percentage of the soldiers in your unit were killed (KIA), wounded or missing in action (MIA)?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - Soldiers in Unit Killed (KIA), Wounded, Missing (MIA)
terms.submissionValue: CES01-Soldiers in Unit KIA, Wounded, MIA
synonyms: CES01-Soldiers in Unit KIA, Wounded, MIA

terms.definition: Combat Exposure Scale - Were you ever under enemy fire?
terms.preferredTerm: CES - Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
terms.submissionValue: CES01-Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
synonyms: CES01-Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
